TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventArrivedEventArgs extends System.Management.ManagementEventArgs

span.span: Holds event data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El siguiente ejemplo asincrónico se configura un temporizador WMI para generar un evento cada segundo y quita cuando ya no es necesario.The following asynchronous example sets up a WMI timer to raise an event every second, and removes it when no longer needed. El define varios [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] eventos que se generan cuando se entregan eventos de WMI.The defines several [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] events which are raised when WMI events are delivered. Los delegados están asociados a estos eventos para controlar los datos de entrada.Delegates are attached to these events for handling the incoming data. [!code-csharp[wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs/cs/EventArrivedEventArgs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs/vb/EventArrivedEventArgs.vb#1)]

public: property System::Management::ManagementBaseObject ^ NewEvent { System::Management::ManagementBaseObject ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el evento WMI que se entrega.

span.span: Gets the WMI event that was delivered.

value.span: Devuelve que contiene el evento WMI entregado.

span.span: Returns a that contains the delivered WMI event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Valor de propiedadProperty Value El objeto que representa el evento WMI.The object representing the WMI event. ## Seguridad de .NET Framework.NET Framework Security Plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.Full trust for the immediate caller. Un código de confianza parcial no puede utilizar este miembro.This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. Para obtener más información, consulte [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
